title: Grammarly uses third-party cookies and Google to show ads

tosdr.tldr: Grammarly uses Google Analytics and DoubleClick to track your browsing history and in turn provide targeted advertisements. They do, however, mention that you can opt out of Google Analytics for Display Advertisers and customized Google Display Network ads in the Ads Preferences Manager.
